short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you concentrate by preventing new tab openings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever feel guilty while you needed to complete a task? All you needed few tabs that help you complete the task but you got yourself lost while browsing randomly, didn't you?

Well, I was like that too! That's why created Focus Mode: Tab Closer. After selecting the focus mode you will not be able to open a new tab on your browser "accidentally". Any tabs you open will be promptly closed by this AI powered extension to keep you on your track! 

Download and try it out!
